text: Charles B. Middleton (October 3, 1874 â€“ April 22, 1949) was an American stage and movie actor. He appeared in nearly 200 movies and many plays. He played the evil emperor Ming the Merciless of the Planet Mongo in the three Universal Pictures Flash Gordon movie serials. He married movie actress Leora Spellman. == Movies == * Flash Gordon (1936) * Flash Gordon's Trip to Mars (1938) * Flash Gordon Conquers the Universe (1940) Category:American stage actors Category:Movie serial actors Category:American movie actors Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:1874 births Category:1949 deaths
title: Charles B. Middleton
